about_the_game:
A story of redemption and self-discovery.

You play as Ken, a boxer who was at the top of his game in America but lost it all and moved overseas. Despite moving away, it seems as though Ken cannot outrun his boxing days. Instead of continuing to flee, Ken decides to embrace the past and return to the sport by entering a boxing tournament.

Back on Your Feet is a A 2D fighter built on a rich story of redemption. Through the game you will face a multitude of opponents, each more ferocious and cunning than the last. You will have to adapt to each fighting style and avoid get caught by their punches. Along the way you will meet characters who will assist your journey and become someone you can call a friend. Despite help, your path back to the top will not be an easy one, as you will be faced with many dangerous foes, trials, tribulations, & dilemmas. This all begs the question, do you have what it takes to get back on your feet?

Features

  • Style: 2D, top-down, & pixelated with minimalist art and crisp animations.

  • Combat: A unique combat system that replicates what it is like to box. The combat is fast-paced but also precise with little room for error. Contains combos, powerful and stunning attacks, & quick dodges and slips. There will be a variety of diverse opponents, all with unique abilities and character designs, all able to punish the player and prove quite a challenge.

  • Training: Practice your newly learned skills in the boxing gym to preparing for upcoming matches.

  • Music: Enjoy original retro-style music throughout the entirety of Back on Your Feet's gameplay

  • Story-telling: While Back on Your Feet does contain only one ending, their are many opportunities for you to make choices. These choices often dictate what cutscenes or interactions you will have as the story progresses, allowing for your story to be done the way you want it, regardless of the ultimate goal being to get back on top of the boxing world.
